content.html: Useful information. Also, yes, you should use 2FA for every online account you have; using a secure app for 2FA is smarter than using unsecure texts; and if Twitter ever tries to take away all 2FA methods unless you have a subscription, leave the site. theverge.com/23606430/how-t…
content.value:
Useful information. Also, yes, you should use 2FA for every online account you have; using a secure app for 2FA is smarter than using unsecure texts; and if Twitter ever tries to take away all 2FA methods unless you have a subscription, leave the site.

theverge.com/23606430/how-t…

content.html: I'm going to say this again: Domestic violence victims need SMS-based 2FA. People without "smart" devices who use social media on shared computers need SMS-based 2FA. SMS-based 2FA is also 75%+ of 2FA users. They will simply stop using 2FA altogether with changes like this.
content.value:
I'm going to say this again:

Domestic violence victims need SMS-based 2FA. People without "smart" devices who use social media on shared computers need SMS-based 2FA. 

SMS-based 2FA is also 75%+ of 2FA users. They will simply stop using 2FA altogether with changes like this.
